channel.title: In your opinion, what is the hardest RSPS base to 'get the hang of'?
channel.description:
By this I mean, understand packaging, how every method works, etc etc.
In my opinion, it would be Hyperion, as it's quite difficult to understand at first glance.

item.title: In your opinion, what is the hardest RSPS base to 'get the hang of'?
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:17, topic:543244”]I’m surprised nobody has said it…Delta/Czar bases. Everything is crammed into the client class and that can be one hell of a time chaser.

I also have to agree with Jmood about PI being unclear at times.[/quote]
Those bases are pretty obsolete. And yes, PI isn’t documented very well and some of the conventions make understanding it difficult. Not too mention that dreadful client class.

Read full topic
item.source: In your opinion, what is the hardest RSPS base to 'get the hang of'?

item.title: In your opinion, what is the hardest RSPS base to 'get the hang of'?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I’m surprised nobody has said it…Delta/Czar bases. Everything is crammed into the client class and that can be one hell of a time chaser.

I also have to agree with Jmood about PI being unclear at times.

Read full topic
item.source: In your opinion, what is the hardest RSPS base to 'get the hang of'?

item.title: In your opinion, what is the hardest RSPS base to 'get the hang of'?
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

Jmood:

I would say PI, package names can be unclear as to the purpose making it harder to know what is going on, methods aren’t documented or are written poorly so that you must go to 5 other blocks of code to find any real meaning, code is just throw around into any class the person sees fit and then forgotten about. Leading anyone else who wishes to develop the problem of than recreating the same method.

this couldn’t be more true

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:11, topic:543244”]Anything that isn’t made by sinisoul is the hardest to become accustomed with. :rolleyes:[/quote]Old cock is good cock!

OP, I never bothered with Hyperion. I don’t feel like comprehending five hundred classes at one sit-down. I stick to my own half-assed creations and RuneSource when I wish to do anything RSPS related.
